name: LDH Level
title: LDH Level
notes:
**Note 1:** Use the reference ranges from your lab to determine if LDH is normal.

**Note 2:** Record this data item based on a blood test performed at diagnosis. In the absence of the lab test, a physician's statement of the exact value or interpretation can be used. Use the highest value available.

**Note 3:** If there is no mention of the LDH, code 9.

**Note 4:** If Schema Discriminator 1: Plasma Cell Myeloma Terminology is coded to 1 or 9, code 5
rows:
Normal LDH level
Low, below normal
Schema Discriminator 1: Plasma Cell Myeloma Terminology coded to 1 or 9
Test ordered, results not in chart

Not documented in medical record 
LDH (Lactate Dehydrogenase) Level not assessed or unknown if assessed
